snippet.title: Soldier of Empire (2004) Gameplay Part 2 (no commentary)
snippet.description:
Soldier of the Empire - first-person shooter that puts the main character in a not-so-simple, even somewhat absurd situation from which he must find a way out. Soldier of the Empire's gameplay does not let you relax for a second. The story begins with a soldier letting himself get drunk before tomorrow's battle. As a result, he is sent to the brig for breaking the rules. Waking up to the alarm, he realizes that the battle has already been lost - he overslept it.
